headline.main: Haitian-Americans say "no" to new DR immigration law
headline.sub: Haitian-Americans say "no" to new DR immigration law

docs.snippet: Dozens march in New York to protest against a new Dominican law that could have hundreds of thousands of Haitian immigrants and Dominicans of Haitian descent deported. Jillian Kitchener reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dozens march in New York to protest against a new Dominican law that could have hundreds of thousands of Haitian immigrants and Dominicans of Haitian descent deported. Jillian Kitchener reports.

headline.main: China Points Finger at 'Manipulators' as Shares Slump Again
headline.print_headline: China Points Finger at 'Manipulators' as Shares Slump Again

docs.snippet: Chinese shares tumbled on Friday, after the country's securities market regulator said it had opened an investigation into suspected market manipulation as Beijing struggles to head off a full-blown crash that could damage an already slowing econo...
docs.lead_paragraph: Chinese shares tumbled on Friday, after the country's securities market regulator said it had opened an investigation into suspected market manipulation as Beijing struggles to head off a full-blown crash that could damage an already slowing economy.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Cartel Land’ Documentary, Vigilantes Wage Drug Wars
headline.print_headline: Waging Drug Wars on Both Sides of a Border

docs.snippet: Matthew Heineman’s on-the-ground film profiles leaders of two vigilante groups fighting drug gangs, one in Arizona and the other in Michoacán, Mexico....
docs.abstract: Manohla Dargis reviews Matthew Heineman film Cartel Land, documentary on American and Mexican vigilantes, in English and Spanish language.
docs.lead_paragraph: Matthew Heineman’s on-the-ground film profiles leaders of two vigilante groups fighting drug gangs, one in Arizona and the other in Michoacán, Mexico.

headline.main: South Korea's Hanwha Chemical Says Explosion at PVC Plant, Five Killed
headline.print_headline: South Korea's Hanwha Chemical Says Explosion at PVC Plant, Five Killed

docs.snippet: South Korea's Hanwha Chemical Corp said there had been an explosion at one of its plastic production plants, leaving five dead and one person missing....
docs.lead_paragraph: South Korea's Hanwha Chemical Corp said there had been an explosion at one of its plastic production plants, leaving five dead and one person missing.

headline.main: China Securities Watchdog Says to Enhance Surveillance Against Mis-Selling
headline.print_headline: China Securities Watchdog Says to Enhance Surveillance Against Mis-Selling

docs.snippet: China's securities regulator said on Friday it will step up its monitoring of stock markets to protect investors against the mis-selling of investment products, following a turbulent two weeks of panic-selling in China's mainland stock markets....
docs.lead_paragraph: China's securities regulator said on Friday it will step up its monitoring of stock markets to protect investors against the mis-selling of investment products, following a turbulent two weeks of panic-selling in China's mainland stock markets.

headline.main: Rangers Score 2 in 9th to Beat Orioles 2-0
headline.print_headline: Rangers Score 2 in 9th to Beat Orioles 2-0

docs.snippet: Leonys Martin ended a scoreless duel with an RBI single in the ninth inning, and the Texas Rangers beat the Baltimore Orioles 2-0 Thursday night behind a dominant pitching performance by Yovani Gallardo and three relievers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Leonys Martin ended a scoreless duel with an RBI single in the ninth inning, and the Texas Rangers beat the Baltimore Orioles 2-0 Thursday night behind a dominant pitching performance by Yovani Gallardo and three relievers.

headline.main: China's Services Activity Slows to 5-Month Low, Jobs Shed-HSBC/Markit PMI
headline.print_headline: China's Services Activity Slows to 5-Month Low, Jobs Shed-HSBC/Markit PMI

docs.snippet: Activity in China's services sector slowed to its lowest in five months in June, a private survey showed on Friday, suggesting the economy still needs further policy support despite some signs of steadying....
docs.lead_paragraph: Activity in China's services sector slowed to its lowest in five months in June, a private survey showed on Friday, suggesting the economy still needs further policy support despite some signs of steadying.

headline.main: Africans Ready to Embellish Tour Landscape
headline.print_headline: Africans Ready to Embellish Tour Landscape

docs.snippet: When five African cyclists stood on a podium in Amsterdam's Rijksmuseum in front of Rembrandt's masterpiece The Night Watch this week Douglas Ryder probably pinched himself....
